name: Fintoc
headline: Account-to-Account payments in Mexico and Chile.
description: Account-to-Account payments in Mexico and Chile.

founders.name: Lukas Zorich, Founder
founders.description: Software engineer from Chile. In one of my previous startups, I spent a lot of time manually verifying bank transfer payments. Frustrated by the fact that we couldn't write a program that could simply tell me how much money I have in my bank account, we decided to build a banking API ourselves.

[Iniciar sesión](https://fintoc.com/<https:/dashboard.fintoc.com/login>)[Habla con ventas](https://fintoc.com/</cl/contacto>)[Iniciar sesión](https://fintoc.com/<https:/dashboard.fintoc.com/login>)
# Cada pago importa
Recibe y gestiona todos los pagos de tu negocio
[Habla con ventas](https://fintoc.com/</cl/contacto>)
+500 empresas confían en nosotros
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601dbbde39e143d6cebd0831/66c7c1e6bed16a624dcd0554_logo-rappi.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601dbbde39e143d6cebd0831/66df4cfff75076a7424f4fe2_Unilever.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601dbbde39e143d6cebd0831/66df61eece6de74c806ec62a_Unired.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601dbbde39e143d6cebd0831/66df63414f5fe7c4c0e79154_BCI.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601dbbde39e143d6cebd0831/66df640da96e17b43c56b06d_Calvin.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601dbbde39e143d6cebd0831/66df64b04ab516b17d625ea8_larrain.svg)
## Productos
Soluciones para recibir y conciliar pagos digitales
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601dbbde39e143d6cebd0831/66f62d44ab4c7f94650ab1b5_idp-logo.avif)
### Iniciación de Pagos
Menor comisión por transacción
Una alternativa más rentable que aceptar pagos con tarjetas.
[Descubre cómo funciona](https://fintoc.com/</cl/iniciacion-de-pagos>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601dbbde39e143d6cebd0831/6707037b08f6bdf377e0ae61_checkout%20cl.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601dbbde39e143d6cebd0831/6707037b0a2da7a8e4b58c88_step%201%20cl.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601dbbde39e143d6cebd0831/6707042bc19c5c534f08fd6c_step%202%20cl.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601dbbde39e143d6cebd0831/67070459ef395abbff10328e_step%203%20cl.avif)
[Paga con Fintoc](https://fintoc.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Elige tu banco](https://fintoc.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Autoriza](https://fintoc.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[¡Listo!](https://fintoc.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601dbbde39e143d6cebd0831/66f6c6cb66554417913b4542_Movements.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601dbbde39e143d6cebd0831/66cb6b56d7c6394419865886_icon-conciliacion-pagos.avif)
### Conciliación bancaria
Pagos conciliados automáticamente
Automatiza los procesos de conciliación bancaria simplificando la conciliación, cobranza y gestión de los pagos.
[Descubre cómo funciona](https://fintoc.com/</cl/conciliacion-bancaria>)
## Fintoc procesa pagos en alta escala
Diseñado para procesar millones de dólares diarios para empresas de todos los tamaños
0
USD procesados
0
movimientos conciliados
## Reviews
Lo que las empresas dicen de Fintoc
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601dbbde39e14302c6bd0842/66d25249b5e155808bdbe838_passline.svg)

Producto:
+76% de conversión

Head Rappi + Itaú
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601dbbde39e14302c6bd0842/66d2528fd6d437821c035ba5_movired.svg)

generated_description:
**Fintoc: Simplifying Payments in Latin America**

Founded in 2020 and hailing from Santiago, Chile, Fintoc is on a mission to transform the payment landscape in Mexico and Chile through innovative account-to-account payment solutions. As part of the Y Combinator W21 batch, this fintech startup has quickly gained traction, employing a talented team of around 60 people. 

At its core, Fintoc offers tools that streamline the payment process for businesses, allowing them to handle transfers directly within their applications—no cards needed. They provide two main services: **Iniciación de Pagos** (Payment Initiation), which offers an affordable alternative to card payments, and **Conciliación Bancaria** (Bank Reconciliation), automating reconciliation processes to save time and reduce errors.

Fintoc takes pride in serving over 500 businesses, from startups to established companies like Unilever and Rappi, facilitating millions of dollars in transactions daily. This performance translates to higher conversion rates: some partners have reported increases of up to 76% thanks to Fintoc's effective payment integration.

The company is not merely about technology; it’s about delivering a secure and user-friendly experience. They emphasize providing businesses the ability to get paid efficiently while improving margins by reducing transaction fees associated with traditional card payments.

With a strong focus on security, Fintoc is certified to the highest global standards, assuring customers that their data is protected. As they continue to grow, their vision remains clear: to make every payment count and simplify financial transactions across Latin America. 

For more details, you can visit their website at [Fintoc.com](https://fintoc.com). Whether you’re a business looking to streamline payments or a developer wanting to integrate cutting-edge solutions, Fintoc might just have the answer for you.
